Name: Faience shabti
Description: A large, very fine faience shabti, pale green with spots of blue-green glaze. The figure stands on a plinth and has a back pillar. The wig and face are finely modelled and defined, the beard is plaited. In the left hand is carried a hoe and the rope to a small basket thrown over the shoulder. In the right hand is a pick. The text is in the 'T-form', one horizontal and one vertical column.
